attributes.action: recognise the bravery, dedication and sacrifice of members of the armed forces serving in Afghanistan and Iraq; applaud the Daily Mirror's Honour the Brave campaign; and call on the Government to ensure that all personnel in the Army, Royal Navy and Royal Air Force killed or wounded in enemy action are awarded a medal.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We must honour those who honour us by their sacrifice. See Early Day Motion 95 and Westminster Hall Debate on 27 February 2008 as evidence of significant cross-party political support for this medal.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
